summary.name: Ayush Jain
summary.title: Leader, Architect
summary.personalSummary: Engineering leader with 10+ years driving impactful product and technology outcomes across startups and MNCs. Delivered intelligent, robust, resilient, secure and LLM-enabled systems. Blend of generalist adaptability and deep specialist expertise, excelling in strategic, high‑impact roles. Proven record of leading cross‑functional initiatives that accelerated technical and business growth.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
achievements: Product Launches & Innovation: Launched M365 Copilot, growing to 1M MAU. Deployed to all sovereign clouds in 2 months.
Privacy & Security: Achieved 20% faster auth. Led team to deliver 245 security tasks and resolve GDPR issues.
Lowered false alerts by 20% and on-call TAT by 50%. Reduced setup time by 30% with automation.
Leadership: Doubled dev count to 80. Mentored for 2 promotions. Increased dev-productivity by 10% with AI bots.

experience.title: Staff Product Engineer
achievements: Leadership: Led, hired, and mentored a 7-developer team for a hyperlocal e-commerce platform.
Launch & Growth: Launched app and core modules, onboarding 3000+ sellers and achieving 150+ daily orders.

experience.title: Product Engineer
achievements: Product Vision: Co-created an AI-enabled social network, setting the product vision.
Feature Development: Launched features with AI-driven conversation assistants, growing to 20K users and 5k WAU.

experience.title: Tech Lead
achievements: Insurance Tech: Built health insurance stack in under a month. Launched 8+ products handling 20k+ DAU.
Team Leadership: Grew team from 2 to 40, conducted 270+ interviews, and mentored 8 engineers (6 promoted).
Product Growth: Increased payment conversions by 5-8% and overall funnels by 10-60%.
CRM Platform: Built a ticket-management system to handle 20k tickets a day.
System Architecture: Enabled 10x scalability with 20% infra cost reduction and achieved 80% test coverage.

experience.title: Co-founder
achievements: Developed a feature-rich solution for virtual classes, exams, and classroom management.

experience.title: Co-founder
achievements: Developed real-time multiplayer games; one achieved 30k+ downloads and 51% D1 retention.

experience.title: SE & SSE
achievements: Full-stack on a real-time multiplayer platform.
Efforts led to 5x DAU growth (to ~5 million) and 2x revenue.

experience.title: SDE
achievements: Owned a service processing $1 million in refunds daily with >90% test coverage.
